assessmentQuestionVersion.name: EculizumabPNH_Initial_AssessmentOfSeverityAndBaseLineMeasures_Q4
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Clinically significant hemolytic anemia due to PNH with LDH >1.5 X ULN (provide dates and values for Hb, reticulocyte count, LDH, bilirubin, haptoglobin and pertinent investigations excluding other causes)
